name: Re-Slash
description:
Made in less than 72 hours for Ludum Dare 47

Instructions:

Wait until the countdown finishes so that you can start moving. Then, as soon as you start moving or attacking, the recording period starts and lasts a few seconds. After that, your moves will start to repeat over and over. You will need to plan your moves carefully to kill all the enemies in each level.

Controls: 

  • WASD - Move
  • Mouse/Arrow keys - Look around
  • Left click/Space - Attack
  • R - Reset
  • Escape - Go back to menu

Follow our newsletter and get a free extra level for our game, TENANT:

https://croxel-studios.com/newsletter

Credits:

  • Pablo Moreno (@HypercubeCore):  Level design & VFX
  • Alberto Navarro (@forameuss): Music & SFX
  • Luis Gutiérrez (@Lwyx): Programming
